title: Taken
description: Three young women belong to me.I've watched them their whole life from afar.Now the time has come to collect what is mine..They are beautiful. Graceful.But Darcy, oh sweet Darcyâ€¦she is a spitfire.She's wild, like her mother.She is everything the syndicate needs.It's time the three of them took their place as the Daughters of Darkness.Let the training begin.
author: Aleisha Maree
